text_block_list.text: "That place" was a sparkly country.

The world's tallest tower, a showy water fountain, 
a desert with a golden glow! Everything that I laid 
my eyes on was gorgeous and screamed Celeb!

Even then, I didn't hate it at all. It felt sophisticated and cool! 
A country at the center of attention――

text_block_list.name: A Certain Young Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
『Papa, Mama! I really like it here! 
I'm……gonna live here~~!』

On a day off, I just felt like walking around town……and a 
car stopped right in front of me. From what I could tell, 
it seemed to be a really expensive one. And from inside――

Oop…… Mama, thanks for the ride♡ 
Hey hey, when's the next time we can go on a date? ……Yeah, yeah!

I'm serious though? Do your best at work, come and 
meet me again soon! I love you Mama~ chuu! Bye bye♪

――……Hm? 
Huh? You're……

You~! 
You're a trainer from the academy, right?

It seems like this girl was a student at Tracen Academy. 
If you saw my badge it was obvious I was a trainer but…… 
I feel like she realized it just by looking at my face.

Nope! You see, lately~, 
I've been checking out all the trainers!

Yep! And I've been keeping a close eye on you too, you know? 
After all……Ah, that's right!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
I'm called Vivlos♪ 
Why don't you come shopping with me?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
It'll be fine, I won't beg you for anything! 
Rather than by myself, I'd rather be with someone.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Honestly, I was supposed to go together with 
Mama, but she's got work. Please, I'd be really 
lonely……hey, it's fine right? Right, right?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
So that's not a no, right? Then that means it's okay! 
And that's that♪ This way, this way~!

And like that, she scampered off―― 
So I ended up accompanying Vivlos on her shopping trip……

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Kyaa~, that shoulder bag is so cute! 
Hey, isn't it really great?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
I kind of want to see the other styles……wait, Trainer-san? 
You okay? Your face looks really stiff?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I love 'em♡ I mean, the designs and quality 
are great, doesn't it really give off that Celeb vibe?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, Celebs! Isn't it great and isn't it cool!? It's fabulous 
and everyone wants them! I want to become a Celeb real soon~♪

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
And~, that bag, I think it fits me perfectly! 
Let's go look closer, Trainer-san! C'mon, this way~!

Apparently, Vivlos really loved acting like a celeb, 
and when we entered a different store……

text_block_list.name: Shop Assistant
text_block_list.text:
And so, that skirt you liked before just arrived! 
Would you like to try it on? The size is XS but……

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Thank you very much! Hmmm~ as I thought, it's 
so cute! But……looking at it, it might be too 
big. Looks like the waist will be really loose.

text_block_list.name: Shop Assistant
text_block_list.text:
That's true. Vivlos-san is really slim 
after all……afterwards, how about we adjust it!?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, please do that! Trainer-san, 
after I put it on, do you know what you should say?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
『It looks good on you!』 or maybe~, 『It looks cute!』 or something♡ 
Make sure you're ready for that, okay!?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Mmmmm~……so sweet~♪ 
Thanks for the treat, Trainer-san!
choice_data_list: Well, this isn't a big deal……

text_block_list.text:
After visiting so many high-end brand stores, ice cream 
that only cost a few hundred yen seemed insignificant……

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Hey, hey, next I want to look at some cosmetics! 
You don't have any plans today, right?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
I mean, when we first met, it seemed like you were 
just wandering. You weren't making a face that screamed 
"I have plans and I'm late"……you know?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Right, it's fine isn't it? After this ice cream, let's keep going! 
I'll show you the lip creams and stuff that I recommend♪
In the end, I spent the entire day with the energetic Vivlos……――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Haaa~, that was fun~♪ 
Thanks, Trainer-san.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Fufu, you stayed with me the whole time, huh?♪ 
That's why……Trainer-san, I――

――Vivlos! 
And you're……a trainer at the academy?

Verxina――even amongst the elites gathered in the 
Twinkle Series, she was an Uma Musume with a brilliant 
track record, during her attempts at the Triple Tiara――

In other words the 『Oka Sho』, 『Oaks』, and 『Shuuka Sho』, 
she finished 2nd in all three races and then went 
on to win the Victoria Mile consecutively.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, as expected of my Onee-chan! 
Super famous~. A real Celeb♪

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, that's right! 
Verxina is the Onee-chan that I'm proud of♡

――Vivlos was that Verxina's little sister. 
That reminds me, I had heard she had two famous little sisters……

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
For looking after my little sister, thank you very much. 
C'mon Vivlos, trainers are very busy people so――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Muuu, I wasn't just playing around though! 
I told you before, didn't I? I was looking for Trainer-san!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
It was a real coincidence that I happened to bump in to the person 
I was thinking of~, and I spent the whole day investigating!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
――And I was thinking this just might be 
the prince that'll take me to that country!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
And you see, Trainer-san. 
I've……already decided!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Together with you――I'm going to Dubai~~♪
